name: Reconstruct
description:
A simple game where you can relax and destroy. You can also build your own structures to destroy them too!

Features:

  • Destructibility is accompanied by particles and sounds.
  • Level editor. Create your own destructible levels!
  • Sandbox mode. Feel the freedom of action!

Controls:

  • Camera move: hold RMB or MMB + move mouse
  • Aim the cannon: hold LMB + move mouse
  • Cannon shot: Space
  • In the game settings, you can see the control in more detail

Update plans:

  • More blocks with unique mechanics
  • Different types of cannons and projectiles
  • NPCs that will protect themselves
  • Career mode and upgrade system
  • Mobile control and Android version
  • These are not all plans, I will also be glad for your ideas, feedback and just comments :)
